segments.text: Hello , I need to come in and see the doctor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you scheduling a check-up , or are you ill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have really itchy skin and think I may have to have it looked at .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you been feeling any joint aches with that rash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I have a low fever .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have times available for Tuesday or Wednesday . Which one would work best for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to come in on Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can fit you in on that day at 10
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can see the doctor of your choice then , and we will see you at your scheduled appointment time .
segments.speaker: S2
